Potions

Potions are consumable items in Remixed Dungeon that provide various beneficial or harmful effects when drunk by the hero or applied to enemies.

Types of Potions

  • Potion of Healing - Restores health
  • Potion of Strength - Increases strength
  • Potion of Might - Permanently increases strength and health
  • Potion of Frost - Freezes enemies and extinguishes fire
  • Potion of Liquid Flame - Creates fire on the ground
  • Potion of Toxic Gas - Releases poisonous gas
  • Potion of Paralytic Gas - Releases paralyzing gas
  • Potion of Invisibility - Provides temporary invisibility
  • Potion of Purity - Neutralizes harmful gases and poisons
  • Potion of Experience - Grants experience points
  • Potion of Levitation - Allows floating over traps
  • Potion of Holy Water - Damages undead enemies

Identification

  • Potions initially appear as colorless, unidentified items
  • Scroll of Identify can identify a potion
  • Scroll of Knowledge can identify a potion and reveal its effects
  • Drinking an unidentified potion reveals its effect but consumes it

Strategy

  • Identify potions early using scrolls to avoid dangerous effects
  • Potion of Healing is the most valuable for survival
  • Potion of Frost is useful in emergencies against fire-wielding enemies
  • Potion of Invisibility useful for escaping dangerous situations
  • Potion of Purity helps clear dangerous gases

Mechanics

  • Potions are consumed when drunk
  • Some potions affect the drinker, others affect the environment
  • Potions can be thrown to affect enemies or the environment
  • Thrown potions shatter and create an area effect
  • Some potions can be used for alchemy to create special items

Related

  • Items - All items in the game
  • Identification - Process of identifying items
  • Alchemy - Creating items from potions
  • Mana Potion - Special potion that restores mana for spellcasters
